column5: Large 3 Bdrm unit at a resort condo development in beautiful Marble Falls, TX.  Free WiFi, parking and no fees for cleaning.  RESORT ONLY ALLOWS US TO BOOK DATES FOR OUR GUESTS FOR CHECK-IN DATES DURING THE NEXT 60 DAYS.  Since you will be a guest of mine, the resort requires guests to provide a minimum refundable $100 security deposit that can be held with a credit card.
column8: Marble Falls 3BR #3 (FREE WiFi / NO CLEAN FEE)
